delete.description: Deletes all allocation for the specified month. **Use DELETE /month endpoint with month and budgetId query parameters instead.**

balance.description: The sum of all envelope balances

budgeted.description: The sum of all allocations for the month

categories.description: A list of envelope month calculations grouped by category

income.description: The total income for the month (sum of all incoming transactions without an Envelope)
